title: Howard Miller Brass Glass Dome Rotating Crystals Christine 9" High Anniversary Clock Vintage Style
description: This timepiece has the traditional spinning pendulum that makes anniversary clocks unique. The polished brass elements of this traditional anniversary clock sit beneath a crystal clear glass dome with a metal base and triple crown finial design. A two-toned satin-brass dial features a circular spun, silver numeral ring while a brass-tone bezel surrounds a raised, embossed center with black Roman numerals and hands. Its spinning, direct drive pendulum includes four revolving synthetic crystals. From Howard Miller. Metal clock in glass dome. Polished brass finish. Satin-brass dial with spun silver numeral ring. Brass-tone bezel. Black Roman numerals. Direct-drive pendulum with 4 revolving crystals. Quartz movement includes three AA batteries. 9" high and 6" wide.
